name: Age of Enigma: The Secret of the Sixth Ghost
description: Paranormal activity and freakish events stalk the land. The dead haunt the living and take possession of their homes….
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7 Processor: 1.0 GHz CPU Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Direct X® 9.0 compliant video card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Is an OK game and can be bought for a dollar.  Story is kind of weak and the end is some disappointing but the puzzle make worth it anyway. playtime is around 1,5-2 hours
